entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Igloolik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:22 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -40.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Igloolik Airport 2:00 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -40.5°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -58
Dewpoint: -44.5°C
Wind: NNE 25 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 41.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 41. Wind chill near minus 58. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 39 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 39 by morning. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 33.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 47 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
